item.title: Harvey, the movie!
item.description: A while ago I was researching the origins of this quote from Stephen Hawking’s A Brief History of Time: A well-known scientist (some say it was Bertrand Russell) once gave a public lecture on astronomy.

item.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak analysis
item.description: The first news article I read this morning described Coronavirus (COVID-19) as "disease X"; The World Health Organization cautioned years ago that a mysterious “disease X” could spark an international contagion.

item.title: Go, in a Machine Learning Application...
item.description: A few years back, like almost all engineers, I installed Golang (Go), added GOPATH to my .zshrc and ran a couple go run .
